fields.label: Use Parent Lock
fields.label_tooltip: Import Parent lock in other supported plugins.

fields.label: Screen Design and Text
fields.tooltip: These fields affect the design of the main screen plugin.

fields.label: Background type
fields.label_tooltip: Defines whether the background will use an image or a solid color.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.label_tooltip: Color for the screen background.

fields.label: Background Image
fields.label_tooltip: Image for the screen background.

fields.label: Close Button Image
fields.label_tooltip: Image for the close button of the screen.

fields.label: Close Button Position
fields.label_tooltip: Determines the corner side of the screen where the button is placed.

fields.label: Instructions Text
fields.label_tooltip: General Instructions to give context about the code or challenge.
fields.initial_value: To continue, please enter the following code.

fields.label: Instructions Text Font ios
fields.label_tooltip: Font for the instructions text.

fields.label: Instructions Text Font Android
fields.label_tooltip: Font for the instructions text.

fields.label: Instructions Text Font Size
fields.label_tooltip: Font size for the instructions text.

fields.label: Instructions Text Font Color
fields.label_tooltip: Font color for the instructions text.

fields.label: Instructions Text Transform
fields.label_tooltip: Reformats the Instructions Text if needed.

fields.label: Instructions Text Margin
fields.label_tooltip: Margin between the Instructions section and the Code/Challenge section.

fields.label: Challenge Text Font ios
fields.label_tooltip: Font for the dynamically generated code/challenge.

fields.label: Challenge Text Font Android
fields.label_tooltip: Font for the dynamically generated code/challenge.

fields.label: Challenge Text Font Size
fields.label_tooltip: Font size for the dynamically generated code/challenge.

fields.label: Challenge Text Font Color
fields.label_tooltip: Font color for the dynamically generated code/challenge.

fields.label: Challenge Text Transform
fields.label_tooltip: Reformats the Code/Challenge Text if needed.

fields.label: Challenge Text Margin
fields.label_tooltip: Margin between the Code/Challenge section and the Indicators/Answer section.

fields.label: Error Message Text
fields.label_tooltip: Error message in case wrong answer.

fields.label: Error Message Text Font ios
fields.label_tooltip: Font for the wrong answer message.

fields.label: Error Message Text Font Android
fields.label_tooltip: Font for the wrong answer message.

fields.label: Error Message Text Font Size
fields.label_tooltip: Font size for the wrong answer message.

fields.label: Error Message Text Font Color
fields.label_tooltip: Font color for the wrong answer message.

fields.label: Error Message Text Transform
fields.label_tooltip: Reformats the Error Message Text if needed.

fields.label: Error Text Margin
fields.label_tooltip: Margin between the Error Message and the Indicators/Answer section.

fields.label: Math Answer Text Font ios
fields.label_tooltip: Font for the answer section.

fields.label: Math Answer Text Font Android
fields.label_tooltip: Font for the answer section.

fields.label: Math Answer Text Font Size
fields.label_tooltip: Font size for the answer section.

fields.label: Math Answer Text Font Color
fields.label_tooltip: Font color for the answer section.

fields.label: Math Answer Underline Color
fields.label_tooltip: Defines the color for the math answer underline.

fields.label: Math Answer Underline Height
fields.label_tooltip: Defines the height for the Math Answer underline.

fields.label: Math Answer Margin Bottom
fields.label_tooltip: Margin between the Math Answer  section and the keypad section.

fields.label: Delete Icon Image
fields.label_tooltip: Icon Image for the delete button.

fields.label: Keypad Font Font ios
fields.label_tooltip: Font for the numbers presented in the numeric keyboard.

fields.label: Keypad Font Font Android
fields.label_tooltip: Font for the numbers presented in the numeric keyboard.

fields.label: Keypad Font Size
fields.label_tooltip: Font size for the numbers presented in the numeric keyboard.

fields.label: Keypad Default Color
fields.label_tooltip: Color for the keypad number.

fields.label: Keypad Active Color
fields.label_tooltip: Color for the keypad number when it is pressed.

fields.label: Keypad Default Background Color
fields.label_tooltip: Color for the keypad background.

fields.label: Keypad Active Background Color
fields.label_tooltip: Color for the keypad background when it is pressed.

fields.label: Keypad Default Border Color
fields.label_tooltip: Color for the keypad border color.

fields.label: Keypad Active Border Color
fields.label_tooltip: Color for the keypad border color when it is pressed.

fields.label: Keypad Border Width
fields.label_tooltip: Width for the keypad.

fields.label: Keypad Corner Radius
fields.label_tooltip: Corner Radius for the keypad
